I Can't seen to successfully install this game. Used D-Tools and installed it and everything goes along but when its finished and i try to open it, it says it's not a correct Win32 file.. like wtf?

If you've played "I'm Gonna Serve You 4" this is by the same creators, and thus, have a lot of the same design elements in it (which you'll see within the first minute).  The story is 4 times longer though.  It takes forever to get to the good stuff, but when you do, it feels a little more satisfying.  They actually take the time to put the characters stories together.  Overall, good game.

Oh yeah, and i'm running this on Win7 no problem.
I love this game and the other one's that work instead of downloading the one's that don't work now thats a waste of time.

To install this game, you need daemon tools. Go to the folder you downloaded this to, right click on "hht-snow.bin" and choose to mount it. I was confused at first because the default program to open it was my vlc media player and I'm used to only using daemon for iso files. Anyway, once you've mounted it, go to Computer > D: and open Setup.exe. Follow the instructions and you're good to go. Great torrent btw, thanks, works perfectly so far :D
